headline: Microchip Technology: MCHP Needs To Show Tangible Improvements (Rating Downgrade)
summary: Microchip Technology's 3Q25 results showed a 42% y/y revenue decline, with gross margin compressing to 54.7%. Check out why I downgrade MCHP stock to a hold.
